title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser

(Minister of State at the Department of Justice) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department justice) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Matthew Fenlon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Matthew Fenlon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
the offices of the Department of Justice, is appointed as Special Adviser to 
James Browne, Minister of State at the Department of Justice, with effect from 
4 March 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
27 March, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th April, 2024. 

 [128] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
